alternativeNames: Lan, Young Zhen; Lan, Young Chen
examples: Arabis holanshanica Y.Z. Lan & T.Y. Cheo in Bull. Bot. Lab. North-East. Forest Inst., 1980(6): 77 (1980). Dryopteris liyangensis Ching &  Y.C. Lan in Fl. Kiang Su, 1: 466 (1977).
